cause.description:
For many years now I've been collecting money for the MSPCA (Massachusetts Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals) and I'm hoping to really make a dent in their efforts to save all these homeless/abused animals.
1. Find homes for abused animals
2. Support growing MSPCA facilities
3. Raise awareness
cause.mission: Acquire enough money to try to help these animals
cause.name: MSPCA
